ambusher.name: Ambusher
desc: On every night, you may hide outside a citizen's house, and deal a Normal attack towards one random visitor that night.
Should you be the last remaining Mafia Killing role, you will deal Special attacks towards all visitors.
ambusher.ability: - Hide outside a player's house, dealing Normal attack towards one random visitor.
ambusher.attribute:
- __Last MK:__ Attack all visitors with a Special attack.
- Access to Mafia chat.

anesthetist.name: Anesthetist
desc: On every night, you may drug a citizen. This will hide all status messages that they should have gotten that night, except for death confirmation and the knowledge that they were drugged.
anesthetist.ability: - Drug a player, hiding all status messages that they should have gotten that night.

blackmailer.name: Blackmailer
desc: On every night, you may blackmail a citizen, which grants them the __Silenced__ status effect for one day cycle. This will prevent them from talking in any channel for 1 entire day cycle.
You can also hear all whispers during the game.
blackmailer.ability: - Blackmail a player, preventing them from talking in public and faction channels for one full day cycle.
blackmailer.attribute:
- See content of every whisper.
- Access to Mafia chat.

consort.name: Consort
desc: On every night, you may __roleblock__ a citizen. If they do not have *Roleblock Immunity*, you will prevent them from using their ability for the night.
You will know if your target has *Roleblock Immunity* and could not be roleblocked.
You also have permanent *Roleblock Immunity* yourself.
consort.attribute:
- Will know if target has *Roleblock Immunity*.
- Roleblock Immunity
- Access to Mafia chat.

coroner.name: Coroner
desc: On every night, you may forge the death cause of a citizen. If your target dies on the same night, the forged death cause will display in logbook instead.
Successfully forging thrice in a game will create a Logbook announcement, stating that a Coroner is in the game.
coroner.ability: - Forge the death cause of a player, if they die on the same night.
coroner.attribute:
- Successfully forging thrice will reveal that there is a Coroner in-game.
- Access to Mafia chat.

disguiser.name: Disguiser
desc: On every night, you may select one citizen to disguise as their role. This will be seen by all role-investigating abilities and in the Logbook instead of your true identity.
If your target dies on the same night, their role will display as your previous identity in the Logbook.
You will not know what role your disguise is.
disguiser.ability:
- Select a player to disguise as their role.
- If target dies on the same night, target will appear as the previously assumed identity.
disguiser.attribute:
- Disguise is displayed to Detectives, Sheriffs, Inspectors, Witches and Secretaries.
- Disguise is displayed in logbook entries.
- Access to Mafia chat.

forger.name: Forger
desc: On every night, you may attempt to forge a citizen's Last Will. If they die on the same night, your forged Last Will will show up in the Logbook instead, and only you may read their original Will.
You also possess permanent *Control Immunity*.
forger.ability: - Forge the Last Will of up to 2 players.
forger.attribute:
- Ability will not be consumed if target dies at daytime.
- Control Immunity
- Access to Mafia chat.

framer.name: Framer
desc: On every night, you may either frame a non-Mafia, or clean a Mafia member (including yourself).
Framing a non-Mafia citizen will make them appear as guilty to Sheriffs and Secretaries.
Cleaning a Mafia member (including yourself) will grant them *Detection Immunity*, which makes them appear as innocent to Sheriffs and Secretaries.
framer.ability:
- Targeting non-Mafia: Frame a player to make them appear as a Framer to Sheriffs and Detectives.
- Targeting Mafia/Self: Clean a player to give them *Detection Immunity* against Sheriffs.

godfather.name: Godfather
desc: On every night, you may either frame a non-Mafia, or clean a Mafia member (including yourself).
Framing a non-Mafia citizen will make them appear as guilty to Sheriffs and Secretaries.
Cleaning a Mafia member (including yourself) will grant them *Detection Immunity*, which makes them appear as innocent to Sheriffs and Secretaries.
godfather.ability:
- Order the Mafioso to attack a player.
- Attack the chosen target if Mafioso cannot attack
godfather.attribute:
- Detection Immunity
- Night Immunity
- Access to Mafia chat.

hypnotist.name: Hypnotist (hypno)
hypnotist.ability: - Give a player a fake status message of your own choice.
hypnotist.extra:
**See also:**
Status messages that the Hypnotist can create: `.r hypno list`

list: Status messages that the Hypnotist can create:

:taxi: **A Driver moved you to another location.**
:no_pedestrians: **Someone occupied your night. You were roleblocked!**
:warning: **You have been poisoned and will die tomorrow!**
:syringe: **You were poisoned but someone nursed you back to health!**
:syringe: **You were attacked but someone nursed you back to health!**
:shield: **Someone tried to attack you but were fought off!**
:shield: **Someone tried to poison you but were fought off!**
:sparkles: **You feel a mystical power dominating you. You were controlled by a Witch!**
:cyclone: **You were drugged by an Anesthetist!**
:dagger: **You are being held hostage by a Kidnapper!**

inspector.name: Inspector
inspector.ability: - Inspect a player to know their exact role.

janitor.name: Janitor
janitor.ability:
- If target dies on same night, destroy their role and Last Will. 3 uses.
- If successful, see target's role.

kidnapper.name: Kidnapper (kid/kidn)
kidnapper.ability:
- Hold a player as hostage.
- If killed by any cause, hostage will be dealt an Unstoppable attack immedately.
kidnapper.attribute:
- Target will know they are being held hostage.
- Can only hold 1 player hostage at a time.
- Attack bypass all protections and immunities.
- Access to Mafia chat.

lurker.name: Lurker
lurker.ability: - Watch a player to see who they visit and who visits them.

machinist.name: Machinist (mac/mach)
machinist.ability:
- Give yourself Special Immunity and killing all incoming visitors, 3 uses.
- __Last MK:__ Send the machine to someone else's house, killing them and all their visitors.
machinist.attribute:
- __Last MK:__ Gain 2 more uses.
- Control Immunity
- Roleblock Immunity
- Access to Mafia chat.

mafioso.name: Mafioso (maf)
mafioso.ability:
- Ordered: Kill Godfather's target.
- No order: kill a player of own choice.
mafioso.attribute:
- Promoted to Godfather if Godfather dies.
- Access to Mafia chat.

masquerader.name: Masquerader (mas)
masquerader.ability: - Redirect visitors of yourself to another player. 3 uses.
masquerader.attribute:
- Cannot redirect Lunatic attacks.
- Access to Mafia chat.

poisoner.name: Poisoner
poisoner.ability: - Poison a player, killing them on the next night. Odd nights only.
poisoner.attribute:
- Poisoned players are roleblocked on the second night, unless they are a Doctor and can self-heal.
- Poisoned players will be dealt an Unstoppable Attack on the second night if they are not healed by a Doctor on any two nights.
- Will know if and when the victim was healed.
- __Last MK:__ Cooldown removed.
- Access to Mafia chat.

amnesiac.name: Amnesiac (amne)
amnesiac.ability: - Choose a role from a dead player and become that role.
amnesiac.attribute:
- Cannot become unique Town roles.
- Cannot become unique non-Town roles if already occupied.
- Role choice will be announced. 
- Control Immunity
- Roleblock Immunity
amnesiac.goal: Take on a role and complete it's goal.

anomaly.name: Anomaly
anomaly.ability:
- Switch roles with a player. Even nights only.
- Attack a player. Odd nights only.
anomaly.attribute:
- If roleblocked on an even night, switch roles with the roleblocker.
- Detection Immunity
anomaly.goal: Switch into another role and complete their goal.

arsonist.name: Arsonist (arso)
arsonist.ability:
- Douse a player.
- Ignite and kill all doused players.
- Undouse self.
arsonist.attribute:
- If no action is taken, defaults to undouse self.
- Cannot be killed by Bodyguards.
- Detection Immunity

bountyhunter.name: Bounty Hunter (bh)
bountyhunter.ability: - Game start: Get a random townie as target.
bountyhunter.attribute:
- If target dies at night, become a Lunatic.
- Target can never be Interrogator, Mayor or Marshal.
- Detection Immunity.
- Night Immunity.
bountyhunter.goal: Get your target lynched at all costs.

cultist.name: Cultist
cultist.ability:
- Vote to convert a player into a Cultist, if there wasn't a successful conversion last night.
- Youngest cultsit: Visit target to perform conversion.
cultist.attribute:
- Mafia members, Jigsaw and Anomaly will be killed instead of converted.
- Cannot convert Exorcist or anyone with Night Immunity.
- Detection Immunity
- Access to Cult chat.
cultist.goal: Kill anyone who opposes the Cult.

delinquent.name: Delinquent (del)
delinquent.ability: - Knock out a player to convert their role to Amnesiac. 2 uses.
delinquent.attribute:
- Cannot knock out players with Night Immunity.
- Detection Immunity

demoman.name: Demoman (dem)
demoman.ability:
- Bomb ready: Blow up a player's house, deal a Special attack towards the target and all their visitors.
- Bomb ready: Can also choose to booby trap own house to blow up incoming visitors. Trap will not be removed once set until activated.
- Bomb not ready: Spend 1 night to build the bomb.
demoman.attribute:
- If roleblocked with bomb in hand, blow up the roleblocker.
- If roleblocked without a bomb, delay building to the next night.
- Night Immunity
- Detection Immunity

guardianangel.name: Guardian Angel (ga)
guardianangel.ability:
- Game start: Get a random player as target.
- Purge target, 2 uses.
guardianangel.attribute:
- Purging the target will instantly Heal and undouse them.
- Everyone will know that the target was purged on the following day.
- Can continue to use abilities even after death.
- Target cannot be Lunatic, Bounty Hunter, Bodyguard or another Guardian Angel.
- If target dies, become Survivor with 1 barricade.
- Control Immunity
- Roleblock Immunity
guardianangel.goal: Make sure target survives to the end.

hitman.name: Hitman
hitman.ability:
- Daytime: Send a contract to a player.
- Nighttime: Kill the client's target.
hitman.attribute:
- If contract was successful, cannot contract the same player again.
- If client orders to attack yourself, contract will be cancelled.
- Client can refuse the contract.
- Detection Immunity

jigsaw.name: Jigsaw
jigsaw.ability:
- Daytime: Choose a player to kidnap.
- Nighttime: Play rock-paper-scissors against your victim.
jigsaw.attribute:
- If Jigsaw win, victim dies to an Unstoppable attack.
- If victim win, victim will know Jigsaw's name.
- If tie, nothing happens.
- Victim has Special Immunity during the game, but also roleblocked and cannot talk anywhere.
- Cannot kidnap Interrogator's target.
- Detection Immunity

juggernaut.name: Juggernaut (jugg)
juggernaut.ability:
- Level up with every successful kill.
- Level 1: Attack a player. Odd nights only.
- Level 2: Attack a player on any night.
- Level 3: Can now deal Special Attacks.
- Level 4: Deal Special Attack towards target and all their visitors.
juggernaut.attribute:
- Level 1: + Detection Immunity
- Level 2: + Night Immunity
- Level 3: + Special Immunity
- Level 4: + If roleblocked, kill roleblockers.

lunatic.name: Lunatic
lunatic.ability: - When goal is met, must kill one guilty voter.
lunatic.attribute:
- Unstoppable attack.
- Attack cannot be swapped or redirected.
- Detection Immunity
lunatic.goal: Get yourself lynched at all costs.

secretary.name: Secretary (sec)
secretary.ability:
- Choose a faction from a dead player and side with that faction.
- After siding: Investigate a player to see their intention towards the sided faction.
secretary.attribute:
- Faction choice will be announced.
- Roles with Detection Immunity will always be seen as harmless.
- Control Immunity
- Roleblock Immunity
secretary.goal: Make sure the chosen faction wins.

serialkiller.name: Serial Killer (sk)
serialkiller.attribute:
- If roleblocked, kill the roleblocker.
- Know the name of every other Serial Killer in the game.
- Night Immunity

witch.name: Witch
witch.ability: - Control a player, forcing them to visit another player.
witch.attribute:
- Victims won't know who they were forced to visit.
- Will know victim's role.
- Will know if victim has Control Immunity.
- If converted by Cult, become Sorceress.
- Night Immunity *until* attacked once.
- Detection Immunity
- Control Immunity
- Roleblock Immunity

agent.name: Agent
agent.ability:
- Spy on a player to see the roles of their visitors that night.
- See the names of those the Mafia visited.

attorney.name: Attorney (att)
attorney.ability:
- Select a player to remove their name from next day's trial.
- Max 3 uses.

bodyguard.name: Bodyguard (bg)
bodyguard.ability:
- Guard a player, giving them Special Immunity.
- Give self Night Immunity, 1 use.
bodyguard.attribute: - If target is attacked, deal a Special attack to the attacker, but die in the process.

crusader.name: Crusader (crus)
crusader.ability: - Guard a player, dealing a normal attack towards all their visitors.

detective.name: Detective (det)
detective.ability: - Investigate a player to get a hint to their role.
detective.extra:
**See also:**
Possible investigation results: `.role det results`

results:
Your target...

**carries firearm:** Enforcer / Veteran / Mafioso / Ambusher / Hitman
**knows your secrets:** Agent / Interrogator / Landlord / Blackmailer / Jigsaw
**will always get things their way:** Escort / Driver / Consort / Masquerader / Hypnotist
**keeps to themselves:** Lookout / Tracker / Exorcist / Lurker / Witch / Stalker
**carries sensitive information:** Detective / Mayor / Marshal / Inspector / Forger
 **believes in the greater good:** Bodyguard / Crusader / Godfather / Machinist / Cultist / Arsonist
**is a relentless persuader:** Sheriff / Attorney / Kidnapper / Bounty Hunter / Demoman / Delinquent
**has a strange relation to the concept of death:** Medium / Resurrector / Janitor / Coroner / Survivor / Guardian Angel
**knows where it hurts the most:** Doctor / Anesthetist / Poisoner / Serial Killer / Amnesiac
**is not who they claim to be:** Framer / Disguiser / Lunatic / Anomaly / Secretary / Juggernaut

doctor.name: Doctor (doc)
doctor.ability:
- Heal a player, granting them Special Immunity and also cure them of poison.
- Heal thyself, 1 use.

driver.name: Driver
driver.ability: - Switch 2 players, redirecting all actions towards one player to target the other and vice versa.
driver.attribute:
- Control immunity.
- Roleblock immunity.
- Cannot redirect Lunatic attacks.

enforcer.name: Enforcer (enf)
enforcer.attribute:
- Cannot shoot on the first night.
- Killing a Townie will empty all uses.

escort.name: Escort (esc)
escort.attribute:
- Will know if target has roleblock immunity.
- Will die if roleblocking a Serial Killer or a Demoman with a bomb.
- Roleblock Immunity

exorcist.name: Exorcist (ex)
exorcist.ability: - Visit a player to watch for Cultists.
exorcist.attribute:
- If target is a Cultist, kill target.
- If visited by a Cultist, kill the visiting Cultist.
- If target was visited by a Cultist, kill the visiting Cultist.
- If all Cultists are dead, become an Enforcer with 2 bullets.

interrogator.name: Interrogator (int)
interrogator.ability:
- Day: Kidnap a player for interrogation.
- Night: Execute the target. 3 uses.
interrogator.attribute:
- Can talk with target anonymously at night.
- Target cannot talk anywhere else during interrogation.
- Target has Special Immunity during interrogation.
- Cannot execute on the first night.

landlord.name: Landlord (ll)
landlord.ability: - Restrict a player's property and ban entry from 2 role alignments.

lookout.name: Lookout (lo)
lookout.ability: - Watch a player to see the names of their visitors that night.

marshal.name: Marshal (mar)
marshal.ability:
- Reveal role in public and call for group lynch on the day of reveal, 1 use.
- Call for group lynch post-reveal, 1 use.
marshal.attribute: - Group lynch will lynch 3 top-voted players instead of 1.
marshal.extra: **Note:** Cannot exist in the same game as Mayor.

mayor.name: Mayor
mayor.attribute: - After revealing, your votes in trial counts as 3.
mayor.extra: **Note:** Cannot exist in the same game as Marshal.

medium.name: Medium (med)
medium.ability:
- While alive: Talk to dead people at night.
- While dead: Select a player to talk to them in private for a night. 1 use.

resurrector.name: Resurrector (res)
resurrector.ability: - While alive: Resurrect a dead player. 1 use.

sheriff.name: Sheriff
sheriff.ability: - Interrogate a player to check for suspicious activities.
sheriff.attribute:
- Can detect Mafia members.
- Can detect Serial Killers.
- Can detect Stalkers at Level 3 and above.

tracker.name: Tracker
tracker.ability: - Follow a player to see who they are visiting.

veteran.name: Veteran (vet)
veteran.ability: - Go on Alert, giving yourself Special Immunity and killing all incoming visitors. 3 uses.
